I've created two arc files generated by crawling the same material.  These 
omit dns records:

~parkert/heritrix-crawl08-easy-desktop.arc.gz
~parkert/heritrix-crawl08-easy-nightlybuildscript.arc.gz

Both can be found on homeserver, and should be viewable to the webcrawl
group.

Worth noting, both were run from the same source (compiled on different 
machines) and on the same pages, however the files differ in size by 6 
bytes.  I did not look into why this was the case.

pt.
-- 
Parker Thompson
The Internet Archive
510.541.0125

On Thu, 26 Jun 2003, Gordon Mohr wrote:

|A 1.1MB arc.gz of what the dev version of Heritrix gets, when crawling from...
|
|    http://crawl08.archive.org
|
|...is available in my archive home directory, 
|
|    ~gojomo/heritrix-against-crawl08(EasyGarden).arc.gz
|
|Though the test garden is still trivial, it'd be useful to run Mercator and
|HTTrack against it as well, and then run the comparison reports to verify
|that (for this simple test) there are no discrepancies between what is 
|cpatured. 
|
|Judy, could you do this and post the results to the list?
|
|- Gordon
